column2: To change your preparation time by API please use the this method by clicking here: https://dev.cdiscount.com/marketplace/?page_id=1013. if you use an integrator please contact your partner to have more information. They have been informed of tis change. Offers with a preparation time superior than 5 working days will be automatically unpublished from the 24th of June 2020.
We meet currently a problem to get data from offers by API from S26. Our technical teams are mobilized on the subject.
